description: Ankoku Dai Shogun has defeated all Dynamic Super Robots and is about to destroy Aphrodite A when suddenly Shin Getter Robot and Grendizer appear to rescue Aphrodite A and defeat him. But when they do, the Emperor of Darkness appears and all seems grim, until a new Dynamic Super Robot, piloted by Kabuto Kouji, appears: Mazinkaiser.

titles.title: ダイナミックスーパーロボット総進撃!! 3
